SummaryEnglish: Noya Itsuki just started his school year at the Ebisugawa High School and since he has always had a fascination with space, he decides to join the astronomy club. However, he mistakenly walks into the all girls Otaku Club. He notices that the members are really weird, but Itsuki has yet to realize that he isn’t in the astronomy club. His life is about to get complicated by being surrounded by so many girls.

6.SummaryEnglish: Blu-ray Disc Bundled with the 4th Volume of the Manga

1.SummaryEnglish: The Astronomy Club is in danger of shutting down unless they get more members.Which is going to be a big problem thanks to Todayama Kyouko

2.SummaryEnglish: Kanamori has been pushed too far and has mentally broken. Kyoko sets up a magical girl battle to snap her out of it.

3.SummaryEnglish: A student from another school has “infiltrated” the club, Kyouko is sure she is an alien, but she might be something more surprising.

4.SummaryEnglish: Todayama Izumiko reason for visiting her sister is vague, but the group doesn’t care. With the help of Oomari-sensei, she might become the first outsider to join the club.

5.TitleEnglish: This is the Miracle of the Astronomical Club! The Maid is Alightened!
5.SummaryEnglish: Her name is Elizabeth Margaret and she has come for what is rightfully hers.

6.TitleEnglish: Aim for the Stars! The Girl Who Dreams of Love
6.SummaryEnglish: Once again the Astronomy Club is on the verge of being shut down. Ooba has invited Iseda out to experience the club once again.

7.SummaryEnglish: Kyouko hasn’t abandoned her goal of starting a band, but with five vocalists they will need more band mates. But trouble seems to be brewing with Itsuki’s constant headaches.

8.TitleEnglish: TTR Astronomical Club Special Investigation Team: Astronomical Special Endless Herbs (Pheremone)
8.SummaryEnglish: The pheromones are strong with Itsuki. When his true personality is released his power is unmatched and almost unstoppable. What will the Special Astronomy Investigation Team do?

9.TitleEnglish: The Astronomical Club's Great Victory! Face Tomorrow, Ready Go!!
9.SummaryEnglish: Kyouko has pushed Itsuki to the limit and is forced to show them all his true ultimate power.

10.SummaryEnglish: The Agonizing Astronomy Club is getting ready for the school fair. Noya is back to normal, but what will become of Noya and Izumiko's relationship?
